TopicTitle: New Kerbals coming to Administrative Building in 0.25 update

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/1a6b987ccc9281d8e48c7cd422fc83c4/tumblr_inline_nc6w51ORMa1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1wQwxKX"><strong>SHACKNEWS</strong></a> has the scoop on the newest members of the KSP crew - the employees in the administration building. Read all about it <a href="http://bit.ly/1wQwxKX"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

Heh I see a sims reference. Mortimer Kerman.

Atleast I think.

Anyways Cant wait!

Edited September 20, 2014 by Dooz
Awesome! I love the Hazmat suit! It kicks ass! Looking forward to the update!! The Hype-Train speeds onwards!

Heh I see a sims reference. Mortimer Kerman.

Atleast I think.

Anyways Cant wait!

I think the kerbal wearing the yellow hazmat suit being called 'Walt Kerman' might be a reference to breaking bad
I vonder vere Gunter vent

I think the kerbal wearing the yellow hazmat suit being called 'Walt Kerman' might be a reference to breaking bad

I'm not too sure. I'm more amused by the fact that it's the public relations guy that's wearing the hazmat suit. Because you know, anti-flame-protection...

Probably Rowsdower's influence speaking there!

Seriously though (even if it isn't), why does the PR man wear a hazmat suit? Imagine what the conversation would be between him and the media.

Walter Kerman: "Despite what you may have heard, I assure you that every launch at KSP is perfectly safe."

Media: "If your rockets are so safe, why are you dressed like that?"

Walter Kerman: "Safety is our number one priority, plus I find the suit comfortable."

Media: "Are you afraid of chemical leaks or something?"

Walter Kerman: "Eh... No. Of course not! I just have a terrible, eh... personal allergies... to smoke."

Media: "Right...."
is linus a refrence to linus torvalds?
Existing strategies?

I like the new texture details on these Kerbal faces, especially Walt's five-o'clock shadow and Mortimer's wrinkles. The other famous Kerbals haven't had quite so much detail.

Is that a step towards adding female Kerbals? I ask because I'm concerned the KSC is running out of respectable positions before female Kerbals are added. We could certainly use a Valentina, maybe as a kerbonaut trainer.
Cool but what will they do????

Yup, gotta say it too. Why is PR a job that requires hazmat suits in the kerbalverse? Other than that, nice tiny additional mechanic, but I'm personally waiting on other stuff. *cough* MkIII and round cargo bays *cough*... *cough* aerodynamic model *cough*.

Bit of a breeze here, wouldn't you say?

Rune. YMMV, of course. And I do smoke more than I should.

I love all three of the new kerbals

It will be hard to get used to them though

I love all three of the new kerbals

It will be hard to get used to them though

I don't think you read it correctly. They are the kerbals for the Admin Building, so no IVA changes

I don't think you read it correctly. They are the kerbals for the Admin Building, so no IVA changes

although that would be cool for like having to wear hazmat suits in the stock lab....

or you can just release the models for us to use

For those who missed yesterday's discussion. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94244-KSP-Admin-Building-Staff-Detailed-In-Shacknews

Mortimer. A shout out to SimCity? Awesome.

http://www.geocities.ws/gordeon/advisor_mortimer.gif

It's a pity they haven't completed the female Kerbal design yet, could have been an opportunity to have an important female character. Squad may have missed a trick here, unless there will be more in game charters added later.

I wonder if Linus is named for Linus Pauling?

Our art team is currently working on a 5 month long art project for 0.26. Those Kerbals are unused models made roughly two years ago, because the admin building needed new dudes. Worry not.

Sounds like Propaganda Ali-Kerman...

While I like the new kerbals, kinda dissapointed by 2 things

1) the Hazmat suit feels a bit out of place, especially on the PR guy. it's a nice suit don't get me wrong, but shouldn't the PR guy be wearing anything else?

2) A bit dissapointed there's no female kerbals, you guys have said you are working on it and I was hoping we'd get some kind of TF2 administrator joke or something. It would have been a nice bit of diversity among the important kerbals to make them feel more unique.
